a.n: DÎner A La Ferme Au Canada (4)

p.d: : Théo Hug Théo Hug, 46, is a horse breeder at Racine, in Estrie. A fan of Amerindian traditions, he has asked the young Mohawks of Kahnawake to welcome his guests with traditional dancing and singing. On the menu: spinach and strawberry salad, pork chops with maple syrup, and "pouding chômeur". Directed by: Mauro Losa (season 7, Switzerland, 2018)
